TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 此类表示要开始生成必须指定的所有设置。

span.span: This class represents all of the settings which must be specified to start a build.

summary.span: 创建生成参数。

span.span: Creates build parameters.

summary.span: 创建生成参数。

span.span: Creates build parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于设置所有构造函数以编程方式生成属性。Constructor for use in setting all build properties programmatically.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics.

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义。如果启用，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics; true if enabled, false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旧式线程处理语义指示，是否提交的生成仅在进程内节点和提交同步执行的则所有其请求将基于线程的调用生成而不是由 BuildManager 拥有一个线程。Legacy threading semantics indicate that if a submission is to be built only on the in-proc node and the submission is executed synchronously, then all of its requests will be built on the thread which invoked the build rather than a thread owned by the BuildManager.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定是否应在各个项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境，例如当前的目录和环境。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch specifying if the operating environment, such as the current directory and environment, should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations.

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关指定是否应在各个项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境。如果应保存环境，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch indicating whether the operating environment should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations; true if the environment should be saved, false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这应是对于设置为 false，以便我们不提供对其他每个环境中造成破坏的两个生成管理器系统中运行任何其他生成的管理器。This should be set to false for any other build managers running in the system so that we do not have two build managers trampling on each others environment.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定在只有单个进程时是否使用同步日志记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process.

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关指定在只有单个进程时是否使用同步日志记录。如果使用同步日志记录，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process; if true, use synchronous logging, otherwise use asynchronous logging.
